panels.title: On-chain Latency (Piece Added vs Confirmed, P50/P90)

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    (sum(rate(jobs_enqueue_attempts_total{outcome="success"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0)) - (sum(rate(jobs_started_total[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0)),
    1
  ),
  -1
)

panels.title: Job Queue Pressure (Enqueue Rate  Start Rate)

options.description: Net rate of pending minus completed (success/failure) checks. Positive values indicate backlog growth; negative values indicate backlog draining. This is a trend signal, not an absolute count.
